column5: I don't know if this is an approprite question for this board, but hear goes. I would like to obtain the services of a guide for Pike fishing while I'm on Lac Seul the first week of July. Can any of you provide me with information to find a guide that would teach me what to look for when hunting trophy pike. I'm not expecting loads of fish, just the opportunity to hunt a trophy, and to learn.What is considered a trophy pike?
These are two of the most experienced guides in that area. Availability could be a problem though. http://members.shaw.ca/slguidesMy idea of a "trophy" northern is 20 lbs or 45 inches.
